text: læw rea di sng brrda rx sul khxng rea ma xyang tx neuxng kan thuk khrang thi rx sul khxng phwk khea di mayang chnchati hnung phwk khea k ptiseth mi yxm cheuxthux khea dangnan rea cung hı bang klum khxng phwk khea tidtam xik bang klum (dwy khwam hayna phinas) læw rea di thahı phwk khea pen reuxng bxk lea tx kan ma chanan (khwam hayna) khwam hang kil (cak metta khx ngxallxhˌ) cung prasb kæ brrda phu mi yxm sraththa
